name: @aws-blocks/h2o-gbm-predictor
description: ðŸ§  A project to create a Sagemaker Model Inference Docker image for H2O GBM Predictor.

notes.text: Initial version release of the `h2o-gbm-predictor` package.

author: Anil Sener <senera@amazon.com>

scripts.build: mvn clean package && docker build -t h2o-gbm-predictor . --build-arg build_mode=${npm_config_build_mode}
scripts.build-win: mvn clean package && docker build -t h2o-gbm-predictor . --build-arg build_mode=%npm_config_build_mode%
scripts.test-local: npm run build --build_mode=local && docker run -p 8080:8080 --rm h2o-gbm-predictor:latest
scripts.test-local-win: npm run build-win --build_mode=local && docker run -p 8080:8080 --rm h2o-gbm-predictor:latest
scripts.deploy: npm run build --build_mode=aws && bash push_docker_image.sh h2o-gbm-predictor ${npm_config_region}
